anyone here familiar with ubuntu/gnump3d: don't forget to try samba if you can't be bothered with gump3de
apt-get install gnump3d` does all that for you I believe
edit `/etc/gnump3d/gnump3d.conf` and you'll be read to roll. Personally I disabled .password protection in that file, and changed /var/music to /mnt/fileserver/mp3
